references.paper_title: Variational inference: A review for statisticians
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive overview of variational inference, which is the core method EigenVI builds upon.
This seminal work introduced the autoencoding variational Bayes framework, a popular approach in black-box variational inference that EigenVI improves upon.
This paper introduced a key technique used in many BBVI algorithms, automatic differentiation, that EigenVI also leverages.
This paper introduced the concept of black-box variational inference, which EigenVI directly addresses by proposing a more efficient algorithm.

references.paper_title: Variational inference with Gaussian score matching
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant as it introduces a score-based approach for Gaussian BBVI, which EigenVI extends to more general variational families.
